name: Sliderman
description:
A simple sliding puzzle game made in under 2 hours for Trijam 67!

Only 3 very easy levels as of now. Not buggy, but definitely needs work.

Controls MovementArrow Keys / WASD / ZQSD / IJKLRestart LevelRToggle Fullscreen on WindowsF11Exit Game on WindowsEscape Development

This game was made with no plan in under 2 hours total! It was made for Trijam 67!

I recorded the entire development process into the following time-lapse!

Theme

It's Late

I didn't really have time to involve the theme in the game much; I was intending to add something about how you're running late in-game... however I was so pressed for time that the real use of the theme was the fact that the game was almost late!

Submitted just minutes before the jam ended, developed up until the last second!

I also followed the extra challenges:

  • Share the source code of your project;
  • Use assets from Asset Jam;

The assets used are from Asset Jam 8 and are as follows:

https://sissyfist.itch.io/retro-synthwave-videogame-music

https://ootkun.itch.io/cyberpunk-ui-and-action-sprite
